text: The Intruder is a 1933 Pre code sound comedy-crime film directed by Albert Ray and starring Monte Blue and Lila Lee, two silent screen veterans. It was produced and distributed by Allied Pictures.The AFI Catalog of Feature Films:The Intruder The picture survives in the Library of Congress collection.Catalog of Holdings The American Film Institute Collection and The United Artists Collections in The Library of Congress, (<-book title) p.89 c.1978 by the American Film Institute ==Cast== *Monte Blue - Jack Brandt *Lila Lee - Connie Wayne *Gwen Lee - Daisy *Arthur Housman - Reggie Wayne *Mischa Auer - Wild Man *Harry Cording - Cramer *William B. Davidson - Samson *Wilfred Lucas - Mr. Wayne *Sidney Bracey - Carlo, The Valet *Lynton Brent - Purser *Jack Beek - Hanson *Allen Cavan - Captain Rush ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1933 films Category:Films directed by Albert Ray Category:Films made before the MPAA Production Code Category:American films Category:1933 mystery films Category:American mystery films Category:American black-and-white films
title: The Intruder (1933 film)
